name: Muninn
description:
Info

Muninn is 2d puzzle platformer. Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. You control Odin's second raven called Muninn. Muninn has a special ability to see reality that others can not.

Controls

WASD to move.

Space to jump.

Move mouse to see reality.

Esc to pause.

Credits

Programming: TurhaArpa

Art: Zalo

Audio: MummoSimo
